# CKDatabase.DatabaseChange.Modification

**Structure**

A database change that represents the modification of a record zone.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Modification
```

## Identifying the Modified Record Zone

- **zoneID**: The identifier of the modified record zone.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The identifier of the modified record zone.
